item.title: Yet Another Software Blog
item.description: Welcome! This is the first post of my blog. If you’re reading this, you’re either arriving right on the ground floor or somehow I kept up with my goal to have an updated blog and you’re reading an older post. Either way, I’ll consider you a founder. I hope that you can find value in the blog posts I have planned. Why does the world need another software-focused blog? While it’s true that we already have plenty of popular software blogs out there, like Martin Fowler’s or Coding Horror, I recently convinced myself that *every* software engineer should have a blog.
